'''Ghost''' is a [[disk cloning]] program, originally produced by [[Binary Research]], but purchased by [[Symantec]] in 1998. The Ghost program launched the market for disk-cloning software. The name ''Ghost'' originated as an [[acronym]] for '''"General Hardware-Oriented System Transfer"'''.
+
'''Ghost''' is a [[disk cloning]] program, originally produced by [[Binary Research]], but purchased by [[Symantec]] in 1998. The Ghost program launched the market for disk-cloning software. The name ''Ghost'' originated as an [[acronym]] for '''"General Hardware-Oriented System Transfer"''' {{fact}}.
[[Image:Norton Ghost 14 home screen.jpg|thumb|right|Symantec's Norton Ghost v.14 home screen.]] [[Image:Norton Ghost Tasks.png|thumb|right|The main Task page from Norton Ghost.]]
[[Image:Norton Ghost 14 home screen.jpg|thumb|right|Symantec's Norton Ghost v.14 home screen.]] [[Image:Norton Ghost Tasks.png|thumb|right|The main Task page from Norton Ghost.]]
